Text: Thanks, fast download. Been lookin' for this
Download the file, open it, then click next, next, next and when done there should be a shortcut on your desktop. Click that to play the game
Can't change the resolution from 640x360, any help?
Update your graphics driver and make sure your monitor is big enough.

yo if you want to change the resolution you have to change it under options before you load or start a new game. Otherwise the resolution will be grayed out and can't be changed until the next time the program is opened.
